description:
In the original light novel, after the point at which the anime ends,
It is revealed that Yuu was born female but became afflicted with a curse which changed her into a boy. The curse`s effects were temporarily reversed once a month, at the full moon; other than at those times, the curse made it so that she was biologically male. Later in the story, Yuu is cured and reverts to being permanently female.
name: Yuu Bauer
